member.name: T:Syncfusion.SpellChecker.Base.AccuracyLevels
member.summary: Represents a list of accuracy levels based on which phonetic matching is executed for filtering suggestions

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SpellChecker.Base.AccuracyLevels.High
member.summary: Represents a high level which filters maximum possible suggestions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SpellChecker.Base.AccuracyLevels.Medium
member.summary: Represents a medium level which filters matching suggestions.

member.name: F:Syncfusion.SpellChecker.Base.AccuracyLevels.Low
member.summary: Represents a most accurate level which filters accurate suggestions only.
